message: Does anyone have a good documentation or introductory trainings for Microsoft azure ?

data.message: Azure documentations, MVA and Channel9 are great resources :)
Also Azure contains a lot of services so you should start with the service you want like websites or databases :)
I need to know an overview about azure then will start going into it's services , but first of all I need to know as an example : how to build robust and scalable solutions on Azure ?
Did you decide to go for a Service like web app or a VM ?

I will go fro a web app but I need to know if azure is like linode , digitalcloud , and godaddy servers .. or it has different infrastructure and different documentation ?? I need a good documentation url .. I've searched the MVA but I did not find anything useful for learning about azure from A to Z .. I've watched some videos they are good but for specific tasks and needs .
Go to section documentation by Service

i need to move from arvixe hosting to azure, are it's nice hosting in app service (asp.net, mvc, api) ?

and how can i get 1 month trial it's didn't accept my debit card CIB Tomas Cook ?
